features: Crystal Clear Sound Quality: Our PQRQP omnidirectional dual wireless lavalier microphone is equipped with professional-grade intelligent noise reduction chips, providing effective identification of the original sound and clear recording in noisy environments. The sponge windscreen reduces wind noise and plosives, while the AI algorithm intelligent noise reduction module accurately filters all kinds of noise and has strong anti-interference ability.

Hassle-Free Setup: Our PQRQP dual wireless microphones are incredibly easy to set up. No adapter, Bluetooth, or application is needed. Just plug the receiver into your device's Lightning Port, turn on the portable mic, and the two parts will pair automatically. (Note: If the match is not successful, don't worry, just shut down the device and try again)

Long-Lasting Battery Life: Our PQRQP wireless lavalier microphone is built with 65MAH rechargeable batteries that last up to 6 hours. The receiver is powered by your device and can be charged at the same time. Our mini microphone is only compatible with Lightning (iPhone/iPad) devices and cannot be used with Android devices unless you have a proper adapter.

Wireless Freedom: Our PQRQP wireless microphone is completely free from the shackles of wires, allowing you to complete motion shooting, mobile phone recording, and short video production in various large scenes. The clip microphone allows you to clip the microphone on your shirt to free your hands and record at a remote distance. Enjoy 65 feet of stable audio signal transmission without cables.

Dual Wireless Lavalier Microphones: Our PQRQP upgraded dual wireless lavalier microphones are compatible with IOS smartphones, iPad, and more. The handheld mic is suitable for interviewing, online conferencing, podcasting, vlogging, live streaming, and more. Upgrade your audio game with PQRQP Wireless Lavalier Microphones today!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the PQRQP 2 Pack Wireless Lavalier Microphones from Amazon, and I must say, I am thoroughly impressed with the performance and value these mics offer. From the moment I opened the package, it was evident that the build quality was top-notch.The setup process was incredibly easy, and the microphones connected seamlessly to my recording device. The wireless range is impressive, allowing me to move around without any signal drop or interference. The audio clarity is remarkable, capturing crisp and clear sound, making it perfect for recording interviews, podcasts, and videos.What truly sets these microphones apart is the inclusion of two units in the package. This versatility is a game-changer, enabling me to conduct interviews or have multiple hosts without compromising on sound quality.Battery life has been exceptional; I haven't experienced any unexpected power depletion during my recording sessions. Additionally, the sleek and compact design of the microphones ensures they remain discreet and unobtrusive during use.Overall, the PQRQP 2 Pack Wireless Lavalier Microphones offer incredible value for their price point. Whether you're a content creator, journalist, or presenter, these mics deliver professional-grade audio quality with convenience and reliability. I wholeheartedly recommend these microphones to anyone in need of wireless lavalier mics without breaking the bank.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Crystal Clear Sound for Content Creators
reviews.reviewText: The ease of use is remarkable—simply connect to my iPhone or iPad, and I'm ready to capture high-quality audio. The wireless feature adds flexibility to my recording setup, allowing me to move freely without compromising sound quality. It's a game-changer for live streaming, YouTube videos, Facebook content, and even TikTok creations.The sound clarity is exceptional, capturing every nuance of my voice with precision. Whether I'm narrating, presenting, or engaging in dialogue, these lavalier microphones consistently deliver professional-grade audio. The dual-pack ensures versatility, whether I'm recording solo or collaborating with another creator.Durability is another standout feature. The build quality of these microphones inspires confidence, and the compact design makes them easy to carry for on-the-go content creation.In conclusion, the PQRQP Wireless Lavalier Microphones offer a reliable solution for bloggers and content creators seeking top-notch sound quality. If you're looking to enhance your audio game for recordings, live streaming, or social media platforms, this 2-pack is a fantastic investment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Product, Easy to Use
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this for my students to use for their projects. They were excited and used it immediately. They easily figured out how to connect it to their phones and use it for videos. They said it worked so much better because you can clearly hear voices of the speakers and less echo.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars High quality set, battery life could stand some improvement.
reviews.reviewText: This live streaming device has certainly elevated the audio quality of my streams, earning compliments for its pristine and robust sound from my guests. Its user-friendly design adds to its appeal, making it accessible for both beginners and experienced users alike. However, a couple of notable issues have surfaced during my usage.On the positive side, the sound quality is exceptional, delivering a professional-grade audio experience. The ease of use and straightforward setup contribute to a hassle-free streaming process, allowing me to focus on content creation rather than technical intricacies.One significant drawback, however, is the limited battery life. For livestreams extending beyond 1.5 hours, I've experienced sudden audio loss, which can be frustrating, especially during longer sessions. While the inclusion of a pair of microphones is a thoughtful touch, the device's reliance on battery makes it essential for users to plan accordingly or consider external power sources for extended use.The most concerning issue I encountered was the failure of the plugin part to the phone, rendering the device currently unusable. This failure occurred after only moderate use, raising questions about the overall durability and longevity of the product. I plan to request a replacement, hoping that this is an isolated incident rather than a common flaw.In summary, while the device excels in delivering high-quality sound for live streaming, the issues with battery life and potential durability concerns need to be addressed by the manufacturer. The inclusion of replacement microphones is appreciated, and with improvements in these areas, this device could become a go-to tool for live streamers seeking premium audio quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use and does a great job
reviews.reviewText: I needed a way to record audio for two people during an interview. This product was very easy to use -- just insert the receiving device in an iPhone or iPad port and clip the microphones to each person's lapel. The recorded audio is clear and it did not pick up the other person's voice even though both were in the same room and 5 feet apart.Was really surprised and how good these were despite being very reasonably priced.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very easy and Quality
reviews.reviewText: Very very easy to setup and use! I’ve been using for my podcast and the sound quality is great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Works well, but beware!
reviews.reviewText: So this product functions directly as promised, and delivers decent, sound quality with minimal background noise. The beware part is that if your iPhone is in a case, there is a likelihood that the base will not plug into your iPhone deep enough for the function. For me, this was an easy fix. I simply purchased a lightning cable extender, I plugged the extender into the phone and then the base into the extender. So the downside to that aside from having to buy another item and keep another item is that it does not light up the red light on the microphone so you’re not sure that it’s working. That small item aside I’m more than willing to put up with it as this unit does a really good job of recording with minimal noise And the battery function is fantastic. This would get a four stars maybe even a five if there was not the issue of being able to plug it in to a phone in a case.

So I just got them today and I just tried them out. I have to say it’s night and day between the microphone and the internal microphone in my phone. These microphones are absolutely amazing and I am very very impressed. Definitely would recommend.
